item.title: Webflow Stripe Customer Portal
item.description: Integrating Webflow with Stripe can be a pain. You don’t have a backend so there’s no where to store your customer’s details to let them login and access the Stripe Billing Portal. Rejoice, we have the solution. PriceWell’s Customer Portal can be embedded directly in Webflow without any code at all. Simply copy our snippet and your Webflow Stripe Customer Portal is up and running. What’s more, the passwordless login (via email) sends your customers a direct link to their Stripe Customer Portal and lets them manage their subscription.
